author: davidlange6
body:
Drafts of random number service tweaks, condor service, and GUID protection tweaks

More info here:
https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/wiki/List-of-PSet-tweaks-applied-by-WMAgent-during-job-runtime#methods-in-setupcmssw-that-require-scram

There are 

- createProcess --> Drafted - assumes the **args parameter gets loaded into a json
-  handlingSeeding -->Drafted
- handleEnforceGUIDInFileName -->Drafted
- handlePileup --> Drafted
- handleDQMFileSaver -->Drafted
- handleSpecialCERNMergeSettings -->Drafted
- handleCondorService --> Drafted
title: Drafts of random number service tweaks and GUID protection tweaks
